recipes.name: Breakfast Power Meal 001
recipes.description: Balanced breakfast recipe with high protein and controlled calories.
instructions: Prepare all ingredients and weigh portions.
Cook the main protein (egg-white) and carbohydrate source (sourdough-bread).
Add vegetables (cucumber, cucumber) and finish with flax-seeds.
Taste, adjust seasoning, and serve warm.

recipes.name: Lunch Power Meal 002
recipes.description: Balanced lunch recipe with high protein and controlled calories.
instructions: Prepare all ingredients and weigh portions.

Add vegetables (bell-pepper, lettuce) and finish with parmesan.
Taste, adjust seasoning, and serve warm.
